title: Online Zen Garden
description: Online Zen Garden is a browser-based platform designed to bring a moment of tranquility to your day. Imagine a virtual sandbox where you can unwind by drawing intricate patterns in the sand with a customizable rake, placing rocks, and arranging plants to craft your own peaceful scene. Whether you're seeking a mental break during a busy day, or simply want to create a serene background for your desktop, this app is designed to help you find calm and creative flow.
